title: How-To: Search for IP Indicators of Compromise (IoC) Across a Data Set
description:
Shows how to search for IP-based indicators of compromise across network-related fields,
often by joining to an IOC list or comparing against a set of known bad IPs.

examples.name: Filter events with IPs from IOC list
examples.description: Uses match() to find events where RemoteIP exists in an IOC CSV file.
